title: Feedback about physics max step size

content.raw:
Hi everyone,

We’re exploring the possibility to increase the physics max step size from 0.001 to 0.004 since we have observed significant performance improvements without any degradation of simulation fidelity \(see details in [PR #216](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/216/increase-physics-step-size/diff)\).

Can you please test against the changes in the PR and see if it negatively impact your controllers? Please report back here.

Either use the latest [SubT virtual testbed docker image](https://hub.docker.com/r/nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed), or update your catkin workspace with the latest code before you make the change to increase the max\_step\_size value?

BTW, the latest image or code has the new Levels feature implemented; which also increases performance since level sections are turn On/Off based on the trajectory/heading of the vehicle\(s\), as show [in this video](https://vimeo.com/349568034).

Thank you in advance!
content.html:
Hi everyone,

We’re exploring the possibility to increase the physics max step size from 0.001 to 0.004 since we have observed significant performance improvements without any degradation of simulation fidelity (see details in PR #216).

Can you please test against the changes in the PR and see if it negatively impact your controllers? Please report back here.

Either use the latest SubT virtual testbed docker image, or update your catkin workspace with the latest code before you make the change to increase the max_step_size value?

BTW, the latest image or code has the new Levels feature implemented; which also increases performance since level sections are turn On/Off based on the trajectory/heading of the vehicle(s), as show in this video.

Thank you in advance!
